title: Christine Lagarde - Wikipedia

title: 'Europe's existential crisis': ECB's Lagarde calls for urgent reforms | Euronews
snippet: ECB President Christine Lagarde urged the European Commission to dismantle internal trade barriers, warning they stifle competitiveness.

title: ECB President Christine Lagarde outlines monetary policy and tools to strengthen Europe’s economic resilience

title: President of the European Central Bank - Wikipedia
snippet: The president of the European Central Bank is the head of the European Central Bank (ECB), the main institution responsible for the management of the euro and monetary policy in the eurozone of the European Union (EU).
